Requirements You are wielding a shield.

You become a bulwark against your foes' attacks targeting you and your allies. Raise a Shield. Until the beginning of your next turn or until you no longer have your shield raised, each ally that ends their turn adjacent to you gains the benefits of your raised shield. You may Shield Block a hit targeting any adjacent ally (though unless you have multiple reactions, you can Shield Block only once). If you are wielding a tower shield, any adjacent ally can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} behind it to gain the increased bonus to Armor Class.
